text:
Dr Tay was very patient and detailed in the examination and provided clear and professional advice concerning my issues. While addressing my concerns, he made me feel at ease. An experienced physician.

Clinic was clean and centrally located, staff on hand was helpful in reminding of my appointment.

Dr Tay is a highly competent doctor who is very clear in his explanations. His diagnoses are sound and accurate, and he is also warm and caring. His clinic staff are also friendly, and it was extremely easy making an appointment.

Dr Tay is a highly compassionate and skilled ent doctor whom I consulted recently because of an impacted ear wax which was causing me severe earache and distress. He was reassuring, competent and able to solve my problem effortlessly. His price is also fair and I would definitely recommend other friends and relatives to see him for any ent related issues.

Dr Tay came highly recommended by some of my friends in the medical field. He is very patient and detailed in answering my questions and also explaining the issue to me. Would recommend him if anyone needs an ENT specialist.

I would like to share some feedback regarding my recent visit on Friday.

Dr. Tay was very patient in explaining the treatment plan, and I truly appreciate his professionalism throughout the process. The treatment was carried out with great care, and I experienced no pain or discomfort at all.

The only downside was the waiting timeâ€”I had an appointment scheduled for 4:00 PM but had to wait for about 30 minutes. I hope future scheduling can be managed more precisely, perhaps by allowing some buffer time between appointments.

Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to continued care with your team.
